mapper.select: select p.name,r.*,o.occupation_name from t_recruit as r,t_personalinfo as p,t_occupation as o where r.write_id=p.job_id and o.occupation_id=r.occupation_id LIMIT #{before},#{after}
select count(*) from t_user as u,t_recruit as r,t_personalinfo as p,t_occupation as o where u.job_id=r.write_id and r.write_id=p.job_id and o.occupation_id=r.occupation_id

select r.*,p.name ,d.department_name,o.occupation_name from t_recruit as r,t_department as d, t_personalinfo as p,t_occupation as o where r.write_id=p.job_id and p.occupation_id=2 and r.occupation_id=o.occupation_id and r.department_id=d.department_id
and r.department_id like '${departmentId}%'
and r.occupation_id like '${occupationId}%'
and r.status like '${status}%'
LIMIT #{before},#{after}
